query.main: SELECT DISTINCT id_animation FROM anim_animations WHERE name LIKE '%!!p!!%'
SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations JOIN anim_events ON anim_animations.num_event = anim_events.id_event WHERE start_date like '%!!p!!%' OR end_date like '%!!p!!%'
SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations JOIN anim_events ON anim_animations.num_event = anim_events.id_event WHERE end_date >= date(now())
SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations JOIN anim_events ON anim_animations.num_event = anim_events.id_event WHERE end_date>='!!p!!'
SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations JOIN anim_events ON anim_animations.num_event = anim_events.id_event WHERE start_date<='!!p!!'

SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations JOIN anim_events ON anim_animations.num_event = anim_events.id_event WHERE (start_date >= '!!p!!' AND start_date <= '!!p1!!') OR (end_date >= '!!p!!' AND end_date <= '!!p1!!') OR (start_date < '!!p!!' AND end_date > '!!p1!!')

input.query: SELECT id_status, label FROM anim_status ORDER BY label

query.main: SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations WHERE anim_animations.num_status = '!!p!!'

input.query: select idlocation,location_libelle from docs_location order by location_libelle

query.main: SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations JOIN anim_animation_locations ON anim_animations.id_animation = anim_animation_locations.num_animation JOIN docs_location ON anim_animation_locations.num_location = docs_location.idlocation WHERE docs_location.idlocation = '!!p!!'

input.query: SELECT id_type, label FROM anim_types ORDER BY label

query.main: SELECT distinct id_animation FROM anim_animations WHERE anim_animations.num_type = '!!p!!'

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations,anim_animation_custom_values where anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! and anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and anim_animation_custom_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL '!!p!!' DAY) order by name

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations,anim_animation_custom_values where anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! and anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and WEEK(anim_animation_custom_date,1) = WEEK(NOW(),1) and YEAR(anim_animation_custom_date) = YEAR(NOW()) order by name

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations,anim_animation_custom_values where anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! and anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and MONTH(anim_animation_custom_date) = MONTH(NOW()) and YEAR(anim_animation_custom_date) = YEAR(NOW()) order by name

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations,anim_animation_custom_values where anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! and anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and PERIOD_DIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m'), DATE_FORMAT(anim_animation_custom_date, '%Y%m')) = 1 order by name

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations,anim_animation_custom_values where anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! and anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and YEAR(anim_animation_custom_date) = YEAR(NOW()) order by name

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations left join anim_animation_custom_values on anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! where (anim_animation_custom_date='' or anim_animation_custom_date='0000-00-00' or anim_animation_custom_date is null) order by name

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations,anim_animation_custom_values where anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! and anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and anim_animation_custom_date!='' and anim_animation_custom_date!=0 order by name

select distinct id_animation from anim_animations,anim_animation_custom_values where anim_animation_custom_champ=!!field!! and anim_animation_custom_origine=id_animation and if('!!p!!', anim_animation_custom_date >= '!!p!!', 1) and if('!!p1!!', anim_animation_custom_date <= '!!p1!!', 1) order by name
